GK19kalrs_au:0: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:
GK19kalrs_au:5: maṇiprakārāḥ sarasaṃ ca candanaṃ % śucau priye yānti janasya sevyatām //
GK19kalrs_au:7: sutantrigītaṃ madanasya dīpanaṃ % śucau niśīthe 'nubhavanti kāminaḥ //
GK19kalrs_au:9: śiroruhaiḥ snānakaṣāyavāsitaiḥ % striyo nidāghaṃ śamayanti kāminām //
GK19kalrs_au:11: pade pade haṃsarutānukāribhir % janasya cittaṃ kriyate samanmatham //
GK19kalrs_au:13: nitambadeśāśca sahemamekhalāḥ % prakurvate kasya mano na sotsukam //
GK19kalrs_au:18: siteṣu harmyeṣu niśāsu yoṣitāṃ $ sukhaprasuptāni mukhāni candramāḥ &
GK19kalrs_au:19: vilokya nūnaṃ bhṛśamutsukaściraṃ % niśākṣaye yāti hriyeva pāṇḍutām //
GK19kalrs_au:22: mṛgāḥ pracaṇḍātapatāpitā bhṛśaṃ $ tṛṣā mahatyā pariśuṣkatālavaḥ &
GK19kalrs_au:23: vanāntare toyamiti pradhāvitā % nirīkṣya bhinnāñjanasaṃnibhaṃ nabhaḥ //
GK19kalrs_au:26: ravermayūkhair abhitāpito bhṛśaṃ $ vidahyamānaḥ pathi taptapāṃsubhiḥ &
GK19kalrs_au:27: avāṅmukho jihmagatiḥ śvasanmuhuḥ % phaṇī mayūrasya tale niṣīdati //
GK19kalrs_au:31: pravṛddhatṛṣṇopahatā jalārthino % na dantinaḥ kesariṇo 'pi bibhyati //
GK19kalrs_au:33: na bhoginaṃ ghnanti samīpavartinaṃ % kalāpacakreṣu niveśitānanam //
GK19kalrs_au:37: utplutya bhekastṛṣitasya bhoginaḥ % phaṇātapatrasya tale niṣīdati //
GK19kalrs_au:41: viṣāgnisūryātapatāpitaḥ phaṇī % na hanti maṇḍūkakulaṃ tṛṣākulaḥ //
GK19kalrs_au:48: śvasiti vihagavargaḥ śīrṇaparṇadrumasthaḥ $ kapikulamupayāti klāntamadrer nikuñjam &
GK19kalrs_au:49: bhramati gavayayūthaḥ sarvatastoyamicchañ % śarabhakulamajihmaṃ proddharatyambu kūpāt // KalRs_1.23
GK19kalrs_au:51: taṭaviṭapalatāgrāliṅganavyākulena % diśi diśi paridagdhā bhūmayaḥ pāvakena // KalRs_1.24
GK19kalrs_au:52: jvalati pavanavṛddhaḥ parvatānāṃ darīṣu $ sphuṭati paṭuninādaiḥ śuṣkavaṃśasthalīṣu &
GK19kalrs_au:53: prasarati tṛṇamadhye labdhavṛddhiḥ kṣaṇena % glapayati mṛgavargaṃ prāntalagno davāgniḥ bahutara iva jātaḥ śālmalīnāṃ vaneṣu $ sphurati kanakagauraḥ koṭareṣu
GK19kalrs_au:57: gajagavayamṛgendrā vahnisaṃtaptadehāḥ $ suhṛda iva sametā dvaṃdvabhāvaṃ vihāya &
GK19kalrs_au:58: hutavahaparikhedād āśu nirgatya kakṣād % vipulapulinadeśāṃ nimnagāṃ saṃviśanti // KalRs_1.27
GK19kalrs_au:60: vrajatu tava nidāghaḥ kāminībhiḥ sameto % niśi sulalitagīte harmyapṛṣṭhe
GK19kalrs_au:63: samāgato rājavad uddhatadyutir % ghanāgamaḥ kāmijanapriyaḥ priye //
GK19kalrs_au:75: striyaḥ suduṣṭā iva jātivibhramāḥ % prayānti nadyastvaritaṃ payonidhim //
GK19kalrs_au:77: vanāni vaindhyāni haranti mānasaṃ % vibhūṣitānyudgatapallavair drumaiḥ //
GK19kalrs_au:79: samācitā saikatinī vanasthalī % samutsukatvaṃ prakaroti cetasaḥ //
GK19kalrs_au:83: kṛtāparādhānapi yoṣitaḥ priyān % pariṣvajante śayane nirantaram //
GK19kalrs_au:88: vipattrapuṣpāṃ nalinīṃ samutsukā $ vihāya bhṛṅgāḥ śrutihārinisvanāḥ &
GK19kalrs_au:89: patanti mūḍhāḥ śikhināṃ pranṛtyatāṃ % kalāpacakreṣu navotpalāśayā //
GK19kalrs_au:93: pravṛttanṛtyaiḥ śikhibhiḥ samākulāḥ % samutsukatvaṃ janayanti bhūdharāḥ //
GK19kalrs_au:95: sasīkarāmbhodharasaṅgaśītalaḥ % samīraṇaḥ kaṃ na karoti sotsukam //
GK19kalrs_au:97: stanaiḥ sahārairvadanaiḥ sasīdhubhiḥ % striyo ratiṃ saṃjanayanti kāminām
GK19kalrs_au:98: vahanti varṣanti nadanti bhānti $ vyāyanti nṛtyanti samāśrayanti &
GK19kalrs_au:99: nadyo ghanā mattagajā vanāntāḥ % priyāvihīnāḥ śikhinaḥ plavaṃgāḥ //
GK19kalrs_au:102: mālāḥ kadambanavakesaraketakībhir $ āyojitāḥ śirasi bibhrati yoṣito 'dya &
GK19kalrs_au:105: śrutvā dhvaniṃ jalamucāṃ tvaritaṃ pradoṣe % śayyāgṛhaṃ gurugṛhātpraviśanti nāryaḥ // KalRs_2.22
GK19kalrs_au:106: kuvalayadalanīlair unnatais toyanamrair $ mṛdupavanavidhūtair mandamandaṃ caladbhiḥ &
GK19kalrs_au:107: apahṛtamiva cetastoyadaiḥ sendracāpaiḥ % pathikajanavadhūnāṃ tadviyogākulānām // KalRs_2.23
GK19kalrs_au:108: mudita iva kadambairjātapuṣpaiḥ samantāt $ pavanacalitaśākhaiḥ śākhibhirnṛtyatīva &
GK19kalrs_au:109: hasitamiva vidhatte sūcibhiḥ ketakīnāṃ % navasalilaniṣekacchinnatāpo vanāntaḥ // KalRs_2.24
GK19kalrs_au:112: vikacanavakadambaiḥ karṇapūraṃ vadhūnāṃ % racayati jaladaughaḥ kāntavatkāla eṣaḥ // KalRs_2.25
GK19kalrs_au:116: janitaruciragandhaḥ ketakīnāṃ rajobhiḥ % pariharati nabhasvān proṣitānāṃ
GK19kalrs_au:119: atiśayaparuṣābhir grīṣmavahneḥ śikhābhiḥ % samupajanitatāpaṃ hlādayantīva vindhyam // KalRs_2.28
GK19kalrs_au:121: jaladasamaya eṣa prāṇināṃ prāṇabhūto % diśatu tava hitāni prāyaśo vāñchitāni // KalRs_2.29
GK19kalrs_au:124: kāśair mahī śiśiradīdhitinā rajanyo $ haṃsairjalāni saritāṃ kumudaiḥ
GK19kalrs_au:126: saptacchadaiḥ kusumabhāranatairvanāntāḥ % śuklīkṛtānyupavanāni ca mālatībhiḥ // KalRs_3.2
GK19kalrs_au:128: nadyo viśālapulināntanitambabimbā % mandaṃ prayānti samadāḥ pramadā ivādya // KalRs_3.3
GK19kalrs_au:130: saṃlakṣyate pavanavegacalaiḥ payodai % rājeva cāmaraśatair upavījyamānaḥ
GK19kalrs_au:131: bhinnāñjanapracayakānti nabho manojñaṃ $ bandhūkapuṣparajasāruṇitā ca bhūmiḥ &
GK19kalrs_au:132: vaprāśca pakvakalamāvṛtabhūmibhāgāḥ % protkaṇṭhayanti na mano bhuvi kasya yūnaḥ // KalRs_3.5
GK19kalrs_au:134: mattadvirephaparipītamadhuprasekaś % cittaṃ vidārayati kasya na kovidāraḥ // KalRs_3.6
GK19kalrs_au:136: jyotsnādukūlamamalaṃ rajanī dadhānā % vṛddhiṃ prayātyanudinaṃ pramadeva
GK19kalrs_au:139: kurvanti haṃsavirutaiḥ parito janasya % prītiṃ saroruharajo 'ruṇitās
GK19kalrs_au:144: utphullapaṅkajavanāṃ nalinīṃ vidhunvan % nyūnāṃ manaścalayati prasabhaṃ
GK19kalrs_au:148: naṣṭaṃ dhanurbalabhido jaladodareṣu $ saudāminī sphurati nādya viyatpatākā
GK19kalrs_au:149: dhunvanti pakṣapavanairna nabho balākāḥ % paśyanti nonnatamukhā gaganaṃ
GK19kalrs_au:159: haṃsaiḥ sasārasakulaiḥ pratināditāni % sīmāntarāṇi janayanti nṛṇāṃ
GK19kalrs_au:164: śyāmā latāḥ kusumabhāranatapravālāḥ $ strīṇāṃ haranti dhṛtabhūṣaṇabāhukāntim &
GK19kalrs_au:167: karṇeṣu ca pravarakāñcanakuṇḍaleṣu % nīlotpalāni vividhāni niveśayanti //
GK19kalrs_au:168: hāraiḥ sacandanarasaiḥ stanamaṇḍalāni $ śroṇītaṭaṃ suvipulaṃ rasanākalāpaiḥ &

GK19kalrs_au:173: śaradi kumudasaṅgādvāyavo vānti śītā $ vigatajaladavṛndā digvibhāgā manojñāḥ &

GK19kalrs_au:178: suratarasavilāsāḥ satsakhībhiḥ sametā $ asamaśaravinodaṃ sūcayanti prakāmam &

GK19kalrs_au:181: divasakaramayūkhair bādhyamānaṃ prabhāte $ varayuvatimukhābhaṃ paṅkajaṃ jṛmbhate 'dya &
GK19kalrs_au:182: kumudamapi gate 'staṃ līyate candrabimbe % hasitamiva vadhūnāṃ proṣiteṣu
GK19kalrs_au:185: adhararuciraśobhāṃ bandhujīve priyāṇāṃ % pathikajana idānīṃ roditi
GK19kalrs_au:187: strīṇāṃ vihāya vadaneṣu śaśāṅkalakṣmīṃ $ kāmyaṃ ca haṃsavacanaṃ

GK19kalrs_au:196: na bāhuyugmeṣu vilāsinīnāṃ $ prayānti saṅgaṃ valayāṅgadāni &

GK19kalrs_au:198: kāñcīguṇaiḥ kāñcanaratnacitrair $ no bhūṣayanti pramadā nitambān &

GK19kalrs_au:203: hasanti noccair daśanāgrabhinnān % prapīḍyamānān adharān avekṣya //
GK19kalrs_au:209: prasannatoyāni suśītalāni % sarāṃsi cetāṃsi haranti puṃsām // KalRs_4.9 //
GK19kalrs_au:212: pākaṃ vrajantī himajātaśītair $ ādhūyamānā satataṃ marudbhiḥ &

GK19kalrs_au:219: dantacchadaṃ priyatamena nipītasāraṃ % dantāgrabhinnam avakṛṣya nirīkṣate
GK19kalrs_au:226: anyā priyeṇa paribhuktamavekṣya gātraṃ $ harṣānvitā viracitādharacāruśobhā &
GK19kalrs_au:231: vinipatitatuṣāraḥ krauñcanādopagītaḥ % pradiśatu himayuktaḥ kāla eṣaḥ sukhaṃ vaḥ // KalRs_4.19
GK19kalrs_au:233: prakāmakāmaṃ pramadājanapriyaṃ % varoru kālaṃ śiśirāhvayaṃ śṛṇu //
GK19kalrs_au:235: gurūṇi vāsāṃsyabalāḥ sayauvanāḥ % prayānti kāle 'tra janasya sevyatām //

GK19kalrs_au:239: vipāṇḍutārāgaṇacārubhūṣaṇā % janasya sevyā na bhavanti rātrayaḥ //

GK19kalrs_au:295: bhrūkṣepajihmāni ca vīkṣitāni % cakāra kāmaḥ pramadājanānām // KalRs_6.13

GK19kalrs_au:312: kiṃ kiṃśukaiḥ śukamukhacchavibhirna bhinnaṃ $ kiṃ karṇikārakusumairna kṛtaṃ nu dagdham

GK19kalrs_au:325: netre nimīlayati roditi yāti śokaṃ $ ghrāṇaṃ kareṇa viruṇaddhi virauti coccaiḥ &

GK19kalrs_au:338: gurutarakucayugmaṃ śroṇibimbaṃ tathaiva % na bhavati kimidānīṃ yoṣitāṃ manmathāya // KalRs_6.33

GK19kalrs_au:349: vividhamadhupayūthair veṣṭyamānaḥ samantād % bhavatu tava vasantaḥ
GK19kalrs_au:351: āmrī mañjulamañjarī varaśaraḥ satkiṃśukaṃ yaddhanur $ jyā yasyālikulaṃ kalaṅkarahitaṃ chattraṃ sitāṃśuḥ sitam &
GK19kalrs_au:352: mattebho malayānilaḥ parabhṛtā yadbandino lokajit % so 'yaṃ vo vitarītarītu vitanurbhadraṃ vasantānvitaḥ // KalRs_6.38 //
